translations: 使……成为贵族；使……高贵；授予爵位（ennoble 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: So much talent; so many men of genius; such ennobling idealism.
sentences.translation: 如此多的天才，如此多富有天才特征的人们，那么多崇高的理想主义者。

sentences.sentence: But there is also something ennobling about the enterprise when it is done properly.
sentences.translation: 但也有一些关于它的时候是做得好的企业崇高。

sentences.sentence: The dignifying effect of his presence; the ennobling influence of cultural surroundings.
sentences.translation: 他的出现的显赫效果；文化背景的显赫影响。
